alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 5:29AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected to continue. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...St Lawrence valley in New York and northeast and northwest Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to one inch per hour will be possible at times this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
